Description.Text: This landmark building with its European flavor is located in one of New York's luxurious residential neighborhoods. Hotel Riverside Studios is only a couple of blocks from Broadway, next to Trump Towers new buildings, and within walking distance to two magnificent parks (Central Park) and (Riverside Park). Hotel Riverside Studios offers its guests a chance to mingle with true New Yorkers surrounded by many restaurants, international specialty shops, supermarkets, buses, subways, easy access to taxi, and five minutes by train to Times Square.

• New York Public Library for the Performing Arts - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Metropolitan Opera House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Strawberry Fields - John Lennon Memorial - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi • Carnegie Hall - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Ed Sullivan Theater - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi • Central Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 2 km / 1.2 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi • Broadway - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi • Times Square - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi • Chrysler Building - 3.2 km / 2 mi • Empire State Building - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi

These charming 120 rooms share neat and well maintained bathrooms; property has 100 rooms that have recently been upgraded to include mini refrigerator, tv, alarm clock, air conditioning, daily maid service and a 24 hour front desk. The hotel also offers vending machines, coin laundry and public telephones for your convenience. Hairdryers and irons are available upon request.

Hotel Riverside Studios is a cozy hotel conveniently located in Manhattan's Upper West Side, one of New York's deluxe residential neighborhoods. This New York City hotel lies close to the Hudson River and is just one block away from Broadway and two blocks away from Central Park. Hotel Riverside Studios offers accommodation in comfortable guest rooms with shared bathroom facilities. General hotel amenities include currency exchange, post and parcel service, 24-hour front desk, elevator, express check-out, candy and soda machines and coin-operated laundry.
Pets not allowed Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon

From John F. Kennedy International Airport: Approximate distance to the hotel is 20 miles. • Directions by car: Follow signs to Belt Parkway West to Brooklyn Battery Tunnel. • Proceed to West Side Highway North. • Turn right on West End Avenue. • Turn right on 71st Street. • The hotel is located on the left.

The Hotel Riverside Studios does not have its own restaurant, but there are many dining options within the surrounding Upper West Side area. Nearby restaurants: • Josie's • Ruby Foo • Ocean Grill • Cafe des Artistes • City Grill • Pomodoro
